name: La guerra ya comenzó... (Prototype)
description:
I made this one-level prototype to show how old FPS Creator will handle realistic (sort of) terrain below and abowe water.

Warning! This game has nothing to do with real historical events!

Some sort of plot:

Year 2002. The Continental Commonwealth and Antarctic Union is fighting over Shepherd Islands (or Islas Pastoras). Take command of Secret Naval Service or AU's Ejercito and lead your side to victory!

Songs used in the game:

"Pase la noche" and "Felíz sábado inglés" by Baton Rouge (1986)
